what: Recover a phylogeny with pairwise MRCA of internal nodes — fun.GetPhyloWithPairMRCA
title: Recover a phylogeny with pairwise MRCA of internal nodes — fun.GetPhyloWithPairMRCA
text: Recover phylogeny pairwise MRCA internal nodes

title: Recover a phylogeny with pairwise MRCA of internal nodes — fun.GetPhyloWithPairMRCA
Recover a phylogeny with pairwise MRCA of internal nodes — fun.GetPhyloWithPairMRCA
text: DDData dataframe containing pairs tips corresponding MRCA.

title: Recover a phylogeny with pairwise MRCA of internal nodes — fun.GetPhyloWithPairMRCA
Recover a phylogeny with pairwise MRCA of internal nodes — fun.GetPhyloWithPairMRCA
code: library(dplyr) library(tidyr) tmp.tree <- ape::rtree(10) tmp1 <- sample(1:tmp.tree$Nnode,5) tmp2 <- data.frame(T1=gl(5,5),T2=gl(5,1,25)) %>% filter(T1!=T2) %>% mutate(T1=tmp1[T1],T2=tmp1[T2]) %>% mutate(MRCA=castor::get_pairwise_mrcas(tmp.tree,T1,T2)) tmp2 %>% fun.GetPhyloWithPairMRCA #> Joining, by = "RRR" #> Error in UseMethod("as.phylo"): no applicable method for 'as.phylo' applied to an object of class "c('grouped_df', 'tbl_df', 'tbl', 'data.frame')"

code: library(TarCA) tmp.cladesize <- "1 (12), 2 (1), 3 (2)" fun.TransCladeInfo(tmp.cladesize) #> Warning: `tbl_df()` was deprecated in dplyr 1.0.0. #> ℹ Please use `tibble::as_tibble()` instead. #> ℹ The deprecated feature was likely used in the TarCA package. #>   Please report the issue to the authors. #> # A tibble: 3 × 2 #>    Size  Freq #>   <dbl> <dbl> #> 1     1    12 #> 2     2     1 #> 3     3     2

title: Detection of lineage specific expression upregulation. — LEU_Estimator
text: PathToData RData file including tmp.tree, tmp.ann tmp.fileout. Tree tree file class "phylo" node labels (using node ID default). Ann dataframe TipLabel TipAnn (tip labels tree file corresponding cell annotations). Fileout path output (e.g. tmp.RData). ReturnNp Return result (TRUE default).

title: Detection of lineage specific expression upregulation. — LEU_Estimator
text: list containing Tree, Ann, BiasNode, FilterBiasNode, BiasFig, PureNode, PureNode2Organ EffN. estimated Np store EffN.

title: Estimate Np using cell phylogeny for each sub-population. — Np_Estimator
code: Np_Estimator(   PathToData = NULL,   Tree = NULL,   Ann = NULL,   Fileout = NULL,   ReturnNp = TRUE )

title: Estimate Np using cell phylogeny for each sub-population. — Np_Estimator
text: PathToData RData file including tmp.tree, tmp.ann tmp.fileout. Tree tree file class "phylo" node labels (using node ID default). Ann dataframe TipLabel TipAnn (tip labels tree file corresponding cell annotations). Fileout path output (e.g. tmp.RData). ReturnNp Return result (TRUE default).

title: Estimate Np using cell phylogeny for each sub-population. — Np_Estimator
text: list containing Tree, Ann, PureNode, PureNode2Organ EffN. estimated Np store EffN.

title: Estimate Np using cell phylogeny for each sub-population. — Np_Estimator
code: library("TarCA") load(system.file("Exemplar","Exemplar_TCA.RData",package = "TarCA")) tmp.res <- Np_Estimator( Tree = ExemplarData_1$Tree, Ann = ExemplarData_1$Ann, Fileout = NULL, ReturnNp = TRUE ) #> **** 1. Check input data. #> **** 2. Get treedata file. #> **** 3. Get node2tip file. #> **** 4. Get pureNode file. #> **** 5. Get pureNode2organ file. #> **** 6. Get CladeSizeDetail file. #> **** 7. Get Np file.
